QueryResult.text: SELECT JOBDEF.ID, JOBDEF_CAP.NAME, JOBDEF_CAP.LANGUAGE_CODE, JOBDEF.EXECUTABLE, JOBDEF.JOB_TYPE, ATTR.COLUMN_NAME, OBJ_VIEW.VIEW_TYPE, VIEW_ATTR_CAP.NAME FROM CMN_SCH_JOB_DEFINITIONS JOBDEF, CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS JOBDEF_CAP, CMN_BUSINESS_OBJECTS BO, CMN_ATTRIBUTES ATTR, CMN_OBJECT_VIEWS OBJ_VIEW, CMN_VIEW_ATTRIBUTES VIEW_ATTR, CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS VIEW_ATTR_CAP WHERE JOBDEF.ID = JOBDEF_CAP.PK_ID AND JOBDEF_CAP.TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_SCH_JOB_DEFINITIONS' AND BO.PK_ID = JOBDEF.ID AND BO.TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_SCH_JOB_DEFINITIONS' AND ATTR.PK_ID = BO.ID AND ATTR.TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_BUSINESS_OBJECTS' AND OBJ_VIEW.OBJECT_ID = BO.ID AND ATTR.ID = VIEW_ATTR.ATTRIBUTE_ID AND VIEW_ATTR.OBJECT_VIEW_ID = OBJ_VIEW.ID AND VIEW_ATTR_CAP.PK_ID = VIEW_ATTR.ID AND VIEW_ATTR_CAP.TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_VIEW_ATTRIBUTES' AND JOBDEF_CAP.LANGUAGE_CODE = VIEW_ATTR_CAP.LANGUAGE_CODE
